name: To The Stars (Fruitc4ke)
description:
The world is almost finished, the Gods are getting ready to put the lights on and start the show but they got a last touch to add : The constellations.

Send your little birds and trace paths between the stars to get the best of the nightsky ! 

___________

Realtime 1V1 dot-connecting game made in 2 days by an amazing team (us), three students of the CNAM ENJMIN in Angoulême, France.

  • Watercolor graphs of the nightsky
  • Dynamic and spatialized intrumental OST, you play your own tune !
  • You'll play to try and conquer territory into the nightsky by connecting dots. 
  • At any time, you can call an endgame 20 seconds from now by pressing a trigger on the controller.

Geegaz : Programmer, graph

Fruitc4ke : Game Design, graph

Etienne : Sound design
